definition: to be definitely able (to do sth)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
surname Neng

sentences.chinese: 勇敢又勤懇，定能交好運。

sentences.english: We grasped small monster petticoat detailed increase to cross-examine, can certainly ask a why.
sentences.chinese: 咱們抓了小妖女詳加拷問，定能問出個所以然來。

sentences.english: Decides can the product and the service which brings to you extremely satisfies.
sentences.chinese: 定能給您帶來最最滿意的產品和服務。

sentences.english: Carrier is here to meet your needs with our portfolio of market-leading products and services.
sentences.chinese: 開利中國定能以領先的產品和服務滿足您的需要。

sentences.english: Stuart can play the piano quite well when he puts his mind to it.
sentences.chinese: 斯圖爾特志心致志時，定能把鋼琴彈好。

sentences.english: You can be satisfied with the multi-looking long-term cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 定能使您滿意，望長期多方合作。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
can then (and only then)
imminent/just around the corner (idiom)
to stand a good chance/to have great hopes/to be promising
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
to help one another/to come to sb's help
lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
to win instant success (idiom)
flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign
to believe firmly
half the work, twice the effect (idiom); the right approach saves effort and leads to better results/a stitch in time saves nine
to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
our luck is in, everything is going smoothly (idiom)
future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
not to be worried about/all taken care of
